title: Nopeming Shores
description: This edition is no longer available for sale.Nopeming Shores by Margie Church with J. Andrew LockhartAn IED snuffed out Gabe Holliway's life, but couldn't destroy his love. Using his unique gift, Gabe struggles to help his young wife, Lily, rebuild her shattered future.But when Gabe's ghost reaches out to her, Lily fears she's lost her last hold on sanity. Can she trust what she discovers and what her heart says? When she sees Gabe face-to-face, can she believe her eyes?When love transcends death, the answers are found in Nopeming Shores.
author: Margie Church
